properties.displayName: Deny assignments of high-privilege roles (parametrized) with breakglass exception
properties.description: Deny creation of role assignments for the specified high-privilege roles unless the principal is an explicitly excluded breakglass account. Combine with PIM governance and monitoring to reduce risk of circumvention.

metadata.description: Full resource IDs of role definitions to block, e.g. /providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/<guid>. Add Owner and any other high-privilege role IDs you want to block.
List of principal (user/service principal) object IDs that are exempted from this policy (breakglass accounts). Use objectId values from Azure AD.
Effect to apply when rule matches. Use 'audit' to evaluate impact before enforcing.
